name: Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland 3D
description:
Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland 3D is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 31-05-2012. It was published by Square Enix.
You can play Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland 3D on Nintendo 3DS.
Hitoshi Suino and Kenji Honda produced the game. It was directed by Yuji Horii. It was scored by Koichi Sugiyama.
